label: A2B6CD_hR10_146_2a_2b_a_a-001
title: Li$_{2}$ZrTeO$_{6}$ Structure
comments:
This is the quaternary form of the \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC3_hR10_146_2a_2a_2b-001}{FePSe$_{3}$ structure} and a distortion of the \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC3_hR10_161_a_a_b-001}{ferroelectric LiNbO$_{3}$ structure} (Choisnet, 1988; De Bruin, 1993). 
 Hexagonal settings of this structure can be obtained with the option {\tt --hex}.
